backend/main.mo: Defines cemetery data types, site content structures, and comparison helpers within the main backend actor.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing functionality of various frontend components and pages.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining global CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling auth state, lazy-loading pages, theme provider, and profile setup flow.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminGrave: Renders an interactive cemetery map with grave tiles, status colors, and an edit dialog. Loads graves and layout data, handles tile clicks, and displays legends and loading states.
frontend/src/components/admin/CemeteryLa: Provides UI for adding and removing alleys and graves. Integrates mutation hooks for layout changes and includes confirmation dialogs and loading states.
frontend/src/components/admin/GraveEditD: Dialog for creating or editing a grave’s details including status, owner, deceased persons, and payment info. Syncs form state with the selected grave and submits updates via mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/admin/GraveManag: Implements grave browsing and searching with infinite pagination and a creation dialog. Displays search results or paginated lists and manages loading states.
frontend/src/components/admin/imageEditi: Utility functions for loading, converting, and resizing images, returning resized data as Uint8Array.
frontend/src/components/admin/ImageUploa: Handles image selection, preview, validation, resizing, and upload with progress tracking. Allows saving or canceling edits and displays the current image when present.
Generates a PDF export of cemetery grave records using fetched data and custom HTML styling, with loading state and status formatting.
frontend/src/components/admin/SiteConten: Provides an admin UI to view and edit site content, handling images, text fields, and saving updates via API.
frontend/src/components/ConnectionStatus: Displays connection status messages based on actor availability and loading state.
frontend/src/components/FloatingLoginCon: Shows a floating login button for unauthenticated users using Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders footer with site-managed contact info and fallbacks, including error banner support.
frontend/src/components/GraveResultsList: Renders a list of grave search results with different layouts for public and admin users, including status badges and optional editing for admins.
frontend/src/components/GraveSearch.tsx: Provides search and pagination logic for graves, selecting between admin and public data sources and displaying filtered results.
frontend/src/components/GraveTileMap.tsx: Displays a cemetery map with grave tiles, using status-based styling and tooltips, along with a legend and alley grouping.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Shows the site header with theme toggle, logo loading from site content, and logout support when authenticated.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Renders the homepage hero section with dynamic background, titles, fallback content, and error handling.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting new users to enter and save their profile information with validation and toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/PublicSectionsTi: Displays clickable tiles for selecting public sections like map, search, prayer, and about.
frontend/src/components/SiteContentLoadE: Shows an alert banner indicating failure to load site content with a customizable message.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Custom hook that returns a debounced version of a changing value after a set delay.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and stored identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines multiple data-fetching and mutation hooks with caching, retry logic, and domain-specific error handling for backend operations.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup defining extensive CSS variables for light and dark themes, including tile and UI color tokens.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, React Query, Internet Identity, and loading global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanel.tsx: Admin dashboard with tabbed interface, lazy‑loaded management tools, and component loader handling.
frontend/src/pages/PublicPage.tsx: Public site page with hero section, selectable tiles, lazy‑loaded search and map, and optional prayer/about sections.
frontend/src/utils/graveFullTextSearch.t: Utility building cached normalized text indexes for admin and public grave search.
frontend/src/utils/graveStatusStyles.ts: Provides style mappings and labels for grave status colors and UI behavior.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters for routing and state persistence.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, themes, animations, and plugins including typography, container queries, and animation utilities.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s state, including features, new feature requests, metadata, and performance-focused objectives.
